class.rdfs:comment: A reservation for lodging at a hotel, motel, inn, etc.\n\nNote: This type is for information about actual reservations, e.g. in confirmation emails or HTML pages with individual confirmations of reservations.
class.rdfs:label: LodgingReservation

schema:checkinTime.rdfs:comment: The earliest someone may check into a lodging establishment.
schema:checkinTime.rdfs:label: checkinTime

schema:checkoutTime.rdfs:comment: The latest someone may check out of a lodging establishment.
schema:checkoutTime.rdfs:label: checkoutTime

schema:lodgingUnitDescription.rdfs:comment: A full description of the lodging unit.
schema:lodgingUnitDescription.rdfs:label: lodgingUnitDescription

schema:lodgingUnitType.rdfs:comment: Textual description of the unit type (including suite vs. room, size of bed, etc.).
schema:lodgingUnitType.rdfs:label: lodgingUnitType

schema:numAdults.rdfs:comment: The number of adults staying in the unit.
schema:numAdults.rdfs:label: numAdults

schema:numChildren.rdfs:comment: The number of children staying in the unit.
schema:numChildren.rdfs:label: numChildren
